about_the_game:
Welcome to Seclusa!

Seclusa is a blend of casual photography simulator and cozy idle game where you can play as actively or passively as you want. Each area has been handcrafted to be highly ambient and immersive, whether you're photographing the local wildlife or relaxing by the fire as the sun sets.

Demo Overview

The demo for Seclusa contains most of the full game's mechanics, but has fewer levels, wildlife species, and unlockables. It can, however, be played freely in sandbox mode even if you've experienced all of the content!

Snap Photos

Your main objective is to photograph a variety of East African wildlife species under numerous lighting and weather conditions. You won't have access to much at first, but as you level up, you'll unlock more animals and locations, as well as camera upgrades that can completely change the look and feel of your photos.

Gain Experience & Level Up

Fulfill daily tasks, complete photo objectives, or turn on the radio and watch the day go by as your XP bar fills up over time. Leveling up earns you credits which can be used to improve your camera, purchase amenities at the lodge, and even unlock the power to change the weather and time of day on a whim.

Photography Sandbox

With fully unlocked abilities, you'll have the freedom to curate your subject and setting to your liking. Change the time of day and weather, tweak the processing to fit the mood, and call on a specific animal species to be your subject.

Relax & Unwind

Seclusa is designed to be a stress-free, predominantly point & click experience that can be enjoyed both actively and passively. Whether you're enjoying a jigsaw puzzle at the lodge or trying to catch a rare animal sighting, sit back and enjoy the immersive African soundscapes and original soundtrack. You're on safari, enjoy it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 (or comparable AMD card)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 (or comparable AMD card)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: You're a wildlife photographer staying at a cozy, secluded safari lodge in East Africa. Spend time relaxing at scenic outlooks, snapping photos of local wildlife, and working your way through a variety of upgrades and unlockables in this laid-back photography sandbox.
